title.rendered: Top 10 Digital Marketing Institutes in South Delhi

content.rendered:
[vc_row pix_particles_check=””][vc_column][vc_column_text]Are you searching for the Best Digital Marketing Institutes In South Delhi? Then you have come to the right place! Here we have curated a list of Top digital marketing institutes in south Delhi with all the major details like course structure, fees, highlights, and placements details. The world is moving digital, it has become crucial for the brand and customers to use digital marketing, to enhance their business and generate huge ROI. So if you are an individual struggling to get a job in today’s scenario, then choosing the best digital marketing course will be the most beneficial for you as it will provide you with the opportunity to work in the various field like SEO, SMM, Google Adwords, Google Analytics, Video Marketing, Content Marketing and etc. According to a report in McKinley, most of the companies will hire digital marketers, and most in-demand are professionals with digital advertising, content strategy, and content creation and curation. So this is the right time to join a Digital Marketing Course in Delhi. So, to provide you with digital marketing, here I have mentioned the information about the best digital marketing institutes in South Delhi. Also in case, if you are living in any other part of Delhi, you can still enroll for the best digital marketing course in Delhi while living in different parts of the city. Here is the link to the top digital marketing institutes in Delhi, Top 10 Digital Marketing Institutes In North Delhi Top 10 Digital Marketing Institutes In Central Delhi Top 10 Digital Marketing Institutes In West Delhi Top 30+ Digital Marketing Institutes In Delhi Top 10 Digital Marketing Institutes In East Delhi    

Step into the Journey of Digital Marketing With Best Training Insitute in South Delhi

Want Kick-Start Career in Digital Marketing in Delhi?

Book Free Career Counselling 
SUBMIT DETAILS
JOIN TODAY
We respect your privacy.
Powered by ConvertPlugâ¢

 

Top 10 Digital Marketing Institutes in South Delhi

 

1. Digiperform

Digiperform is one of the best digital marketing institutes in South Delhi and is headquartered in Noida, Digiperform is one of the most trusted & leading brands in Digital Marketing Training that has trained over 24,000+ digital marketing professionals from all over India. In today’s scenario, when digital marketing has become the most essential skill for everyone, Digiperform with its well-structured curriculum designed in LMS provides its trainees with the learning of all the various modules in digital marketing that helps its trainees to become an expert in the field of Digital Marketing. Being in the industry for more than 9 years, Digiperform with its highly considerable placement cell has helped many of its trainees to start with their Digital Marketing careers. To feel enchanted, Digiperform has been featured in well known online magazines – Yourstory Media – has featured an article under the title “Edtech start-up Digiperform raises $ 3.6 M from HT Media” stating the recent achievements and how excited they are to make the most of the same investment to pick up the pace of growth in the market and build huge brand awareness in the market. With the change in the education sector, where most of the institutes and organizations are coming online to provide educational content to their customers and students, Digiperform has effectively launched its Online course for its students through which the students can easily learn and upgrade their digital marketing skills. Now let discuss the Digiperform Course Curriculum:
Course Types:
Digiperform Certified Online Marketing Professional Course (dCOMPro) Digiperform Certified Online Marketing Practitioner(dCOMP) Digiperform Certified Digital Marketing Planner (dCDMP)
Syllabus & Modules
Digiperform offers its Certified Online Marketing Professional Course with its 25+ Modules i.e
  • Marketing & Web Presence Foundation Module ( 5 Modules)
  • Online Business Visibility Creation (6 Modules )
  • Lead Generation (5 Modules)
  • Lead Nurturing (4 Modules)
  • Personal Branding & Online Earning (4 Modules)
  • Interview Preparation (1 Module)
  • 8 Masterclass
  • 3 Capstone Projects With 9 Specialization Badges
 
Course Highlights
  • 100% Job Assistance
In today’s world, when you can a lot of Competitive & everyone needs a secure job for their future. Digiperform is the only digital marketing institute that provides you with 100% job assistance to their trainees. So, while choosing the digital marketing course from Digiperform, you don’t have to worry about the job placement as they fulfill what they promise.
  • Tools based Learning
With the advancement of technology where every single thing is handled with the tools and software, Digiperform is the only training company that will enable you to get the experience to learn and handle 100+ live tools which are most commonly used by the marketing professionals and experts over the years.
  • Live Practical Sessions
To make you understand digital marketing more effectively, Digiperform provides you with live training sessions that will help you to understand the topic easily whenever required.
  • Industry’s Top Trainers
Learning digital marketing from the best industry experts is like a blessing, at Digiperform you will be get trained by the top industry professionals/trainers who will support you at every problem to achieve excellence in all parameters such as SEO, SMM, PPC, Social Media Marketing, Email Marketing, Google Ads and Affiliate Marketing, etc to meet your desired goals.
  • Free Doubt Session and Backup Classes
At Digiperform, you will get an opportunity to ask the right questions about the marketing anytime in the doubt session, also with it in case you have missed any of your classes Digiperform trainers will provide you with the backup class for the same.
  • Weekday/ Weekend/ Sunday Only Batch
Keeping in mind the busy schedule, Digiperform has provided its trainees with the special flexible time to provide training, where you can join the course according to your convenience and simultaneously engage with your business and other activities while taking the course.
  • PAN India Presence 
With the efficient growth of Digiperform, it has covered almost every city across Asia with the major aim to provide the knowledge of digital marketing to every individual. To date, it has almost 40+ centers making its presence all over India.
  • Award-Winning LMS 
To help its trainees learn digital marketing, it provides you with the best curriculum, certification, and 24*7 LMS designed for its trainees where you will easily get the course PPTs, recording quizzes, self- half tutorials, and forums available only to the registered students for getting answers to all queries related to marketing.
  • Affordable Fees Structure 
It provides you with the fee structure that you can easily afford as compared to that of its competitors. Whether you are an Under-graduates, graduate, working professional, freelancer, housewife, or entrepreneur, you can easily afford the price for the course given to you at Digiperform to make a winning career.
  • High Quality of Training 
All the training modules provided to you at Digiperform are highly concerned about the quality where you will get the various training modules provided you are by the industry experts to make sure that it meets all major industry standards. Also, you will always get the latest skills and new technologies in the digital marketing industry.
  • Makes you an expert in the Digital domain
Once you have completed the digital marketing course from Digiperform, you will be able to apply for the job in big organizations and reputed ad agencies. Also, the major benefit that you will get after completing the course is that you will be able to choose multiple areas of digital marketing as per your skills and interest.

Who can do this Course?

  • Student & Jobseeker
If you are a student and looking forward to starting your career, pursuing the digital marketing course will be the best option for you as it will help you get the job in the various details with a high salary package. 
  • Marketing Sales and Professionals
With the help of a digital marketing professional course, you will be easily able to upskill yourself for a better salary and career opportunities in the various digital marketing modules like SEO, SMM, Online Advertising, Google Analytics, Sales Optimization & Online Earning.
  • Business Owners and Entrepreneurs 
As a business owner and entrepreneur, with the help of digital marketing courses, you can grow your business and boost your revenue at a fast pace. Along with it, you can also target the most desired audience that you have set for your business. 
  • Digital Marketing Professionals 
Although, if you are already a digital marketing individual with the help of a digital marketing course you can easily upgrade your existing skills and knowledge. 
  • Housewives and Freelancers
If you are a homemaker to earn the extra income while sitting at home then enrolling in the digital marketing course will be the most advantageous step for you as here you can easily provide your digital marketing services to various clients from all around the world as well as you can also build your brand, earn as an affiliate marketer, make money with blogging, and start your own eCommerce business that will help you earn the huge income from home.

Reasons Why You Should Join Digiperform?

Here are some of the happy reviews of our trainees that will help you to make a better choice for choosing the digital marketing course.  View More: Digiperform Best Reviews   

2. National School of Internet Marketing

Being one of the best institutes in South Delhi, the NSIM offers the most advanced digital marketing course for entrepreneurs and business owners where the training is specifically meant for providing each and every feature of digital marketing. As NSIM is one of the popular digital marketing institutes in South Delhi. The main aim of NSIM is to bring clarity on how to make a profit-making return to the business via digital marketing. The best thing about this course is that within a few months, you will easily be able to manage and take your business to the next level.
Course Types:
Advanced Digital Marketing Course
Course Syllabus & Modules:
  • Fundamental of Digital Marketing
  • Website Planning & Website Creation
  • Content Writing
  • Search Engine Optimization
  • Social Media Optimization
  • Google Analytics
  • Social Media Marketing
  • Online Reputation Manegement
  • Local Business Advertising
  • Ecommerce SEO and so on.
Course Highlights:
  • Internship with companies
  • Live Online Classes
  • Work with Top MNC Company
  • 100% Practical Course
  • Earn While You Learn
  • Lifetime job Support
  • Grow Your Startup Business Exponentially Using Digital Marketing
  • Online Reputation Management
 

3. Techstack Academy

Established in 2012, Techstack Academy (Reyedin Techstack Pvt. Ltd) is a Delhi-based training center that provides you with various courses to its students to upgrade their skills in a specific field. Here, you will know how Techstack got listed in top digital marketing institutes in South Delhi. Being in the industry for more than 10 + years, it has also developed full-fledged courses into the other niche that provides you with quality training not only in digital marketing but also in Big Data Hadoop, Web Designing, and Development with quality training, smart classes and 100% placement assistance.
Course Type:
Post Graduate Diploma in Digital Marketing
Course Syllabus & Modules
  • Initialization to Digital Marketing
  • Website Planning
  • Content Writing
  • Search Engine Optimization
  • Local SEO
  • Google Webmaster
  • Bing Webmaster
  • SMO (Social Media Optimization)
  • Google Analytics
  • Search Engine Marketing
  • Email Marketing and etc.
Course Highlights
  • Redefined Career
  • 100% Job Placement Assistance
  • Business Increased Revenue
  • 17 Certification Guaranteed
 

4. Internet Marketing School

Founded in 2016 by the CEO of IMS Group, Mr. Sanjay Singhania, Internet Marketing School has become one of the most leading hubs for providing the best industry-dominating digital marketers. Well, Internet marketing Scholl provides amazing training is popular as one of the best digital marketing training institutes. The best thing that you can see about the Internet Marketing Institute is that they tend to provide both online & offline classes with their existing curriculum for freshers, jobseekers, working professionals, entrepreneurs, and business owners. The ISO & Google partner training institute has certified over 6000+ students and placed above 4000+ of its trainees. Though, it owns its own dedicated placement cell and esteemed industry association to take care of the placement.
Digital Marketing Course Types:
Hybrid Online and Offline classroom sessions with practical exposure.
Course Syllabus & Modules
  • Website Planning & Development
  • Search Engine optimization
  • SEM (Google Ads)
  • Web Analytics
  • Social Media Marketing
  • Content Marketing
  • Email Marketing
  • Inbound Marketing
  • Make Money Online
  • Mobile Marketing
  • E-commerce Marketing
  • Google Data Studio
Course Highlights
  • Backup Classes
  • 100% Placement Support
  • Small Batch Sizes
  • Live – Instructor Live Session
  • Get Secured with Certification
  • 24*7 Support from the Trainers
  • Easy EMI options
 
5. Digital Vidya
Founded in the year 2009 by Pradeep Chopra and Kapil Nakra, digital vidya is among the most dominant digital marketing training institute not only in India but also worldwide. Digital vidya is a leading digital training institute in South Delhi and below you will explore more in the guide. Since the day it has been launched, it has trained over 38,000+ professionals from the brands like Nokia, Google, eBay, Reliance, Star TV, Cisco, Intel, ITC, and so on in more than 3,800 training batches conducted by Digita Vidya. Being the official training partner of Google & Microsoft India and has a partnership with Global Social Media giants like Facebook, LinkedIn, NASSCOM, and Vskills, it has an expert panel of over 70 trainers where each trainer is an expert in one specific niche skill i.e Search Engine Optimization, Search Engine Marketing, Email Marketing, Social Media Marketing, Inbound Marketing, E-commerce Marketing and etc.
Course Types:
Online & Offline Classroom Training
Course Syllabus & Modules:
  • Search Engine optimization (4 Modules)
  • Search Engine Marketing (5 Modules)
  • Social Media Marketing (5 Modules)
  • Email Marketing (3 Modules)
  • Inbound Marketing (4 Modules)
  • Web Analytics (5 Modules)
  • Facebook Marketing (2 Modules)
  • Other Digital Marketing Topics (15 Modules)
Course Fee: INR 49,900 + Service tax
Course Highlights:
  • Best Industry Trainers
  • Practical Sessions
  • Updated Digital Marketing Course Recording
  • Digital Marketing Course Lifetime Updates
 

6. Simply Digital

Founded in April 2015, by the professionals from the IIT & IIM’s, Simply Digital offers the most professional digital marketing course training in Delhi that has trained more than 3,000 professionals and helped them to grow their career and business. With the pace of aligned itself with the mission to bridge the gap between the workforce and the digital skills needed to fulfill the Digital India dream there, the main focus is on quality education, updated and customized courses, practical knowledge, learned an experienced faculty and our commitment to ensure the earning. Simply Digital is one of the popular digital marketing institutes in South Delhi and here are the courses and modules that you should go through. Also, it is a google partner group company with google certified trainers who wants to share their knowledge with the other students and wants to see them learn and grow.
Course Type:
Full Curriculum Digital Marketing Course
Course Syllabus & Modules
  • Overview of Digital Marketing
  • Website Planning & Content Creation
  • Search Engine Optimization
  • PPC Advertising & Google Adwords
  • Google Analytics
  • Social Media Marketing
  • Email Marketing
  • E-commerce Marketing
  • Video Marketing
  • Creating Internet Marketing Strategy and so on.
Course Highlights
  •  Industry experts have got excellent reviews
  • Customized short term and full-term courses
  •  The Complete 360-degree solution to all the digital marketing
 

6. Delhi Institute of Digital Marketing – (DIDM )

With over 12 years of expertise in the field of digital marketing, Delhi institute is a renowned digital marketing company located in Delhi to fulfill the demand for digital marketing skilled professionals. Delhi institute of digital marketing is the leading brand of digital marketing and is known as one of the best digital marketing institutes in South Delhi. Trained over 7,000 students and have been recognized by ASSOCHAM as the “Most Promising Brand”, DIDM commits to provide quality training with its advanced digital marketing courses and in-depth knowledge of digital marketing strategies to meet the growing demands of skilled individuals across the world.
Course Types:
  • Master in Digital Marketing
  • Advanced in Digital Marketing
  • Professional in Digital Marketing
Course Syllabus & Modules
  • Email Marketing
  • Google Adwords
  • Online Reputation Management
  • Affiliate Marketing
  • Social Media Marketing
  • Search Engine Optimization
  • Google Adsense
Course Highlights
  • Full Placement Support
  • Career Counselling
  • Interview Preparation
  • Free Tools and Software
  • One to One Industry Session
  • Online and Offline Assessments
 

7. Delhi Institute of Computer Courses(DICC)

Established in 2009, the Delhi Institute of Computer Courses provides you with the high – quality and career-oriented education with the main goal to provide standard, professional, and practical training to its students. DICC is a well-established institute in Delhi and is a popular digital marketing training institute in South Delhi. Trained more than 5000 students in the period of ten years, DICC is among the most reputed institute for providing the full stock market and other financial analysis courses, that will teach you everything practically and in live projects market hours. Also, they will teach you about the various techniques and strategies that will actually work in the market and provide you with handsome returns on investments. The course is designed in such a way that will be fruitful for both the investors and also for its students who are freshers and wants to make their career in the field of Digital Marketing. Once you have completed the course, you will easily be able to get a job or placements with complete assistance to get the job.
Course Types:
  • DICC Digital Marketing Course
Course Syllabus & Modules
  • Overview of Digital Marketingeting
  • Basics of HTML
  • SEO On-page
  • SEO OFF Page
  • Social Media Optimization
  • Google Analytics
  • Mobile Marketing
  • Online Reputation Management
  • Video-Based Marketing and so on.
Course Highlights
  • International Certifications
  • Interactive Classroom Sessions
  • 12 + Years Experienced Traders
  • Live Project Training
  • Free Software and Tools
  • Maximum Doubt Clearing Sessions
  • Lifetime Support
 

8. High Technologies Solution India

Founded in 2000, by a group of highly qualified technocrats with proven expertise in varied technology domains, it provides you with a variety of services with their comprehensive training and online consultancy experience. HTSI is an online training and offline as well. It is known as one of the best online digital marketing training institute in South Delhi. Although the HTS holds the distinction of being a unique group, it not only provides you with direct corporate services but also provides you with services on behalf of well-known organizations.
Course Types:
Digital Marketing Course
Course Syllabus & Modules
  • Digital Marketing Overview
  • Domain Registration Web Design and Hosting
  • Keyword Research
  • Search Engine Optimization
  • Content Marketing
  • Search Engine Marketing
  • Online Reputation Management and etc.
Course Highlights
  • Google Certifed Trainers
  • 100% Practical Training
  • Free Website for One Year for Practical Training
  • Flexible Timings Available (Early Morning, Late Evenings)
  • 100% Placement Support
  • Affordable Fees
 

9. Digiinfotech

Being a professional training institute for advanced digital marketing programs & managed. Digiinfotech is across all branches of Delhi and provides comprehensive courses to the students according to their preferences. You will find below many reasons for Digiinfotech to be one of the leading digital marketing institutes in South Delhi. It is been managed by a team of certified working professionals of the digital marketing team where it provides you with the various digital marketing modules both in the forms of theory and practicals that will provide you with real-time exposure, guaranteed placement assistance, job trends, and interview scheduled once your training programs are finished. 
Course Types:
Advance Digital Marketing Course
Course Syllabus & Modules
  • Website Planning & Creation
  • Search Engine Optimization
  • Social Media Optimization
  • Google Ads – Pay Per Click
  • Online Display Advertising
  • Email Marketing
  • Google Console
Course Highlights
  • Practical Classes
  • Live Projects
  • 100% Practical Classes
  • 100% Job Assistance
  • Google Partner Institution
 

10. Digitalinventive

Digital Inventive is among one of the most outstanding Digital Marketing Institutes in South Delhi that aims to prepare its students ready for a job role that will be in high demand. Digital Inventive is a brand and is a great digital marketing training institute in South Delhi. So by taking the right initiative, here you will get the incomparable digital marketing professional course that will help you have a secure job position with handsome salaries in the approaching future. Being the top institute, it has trained more than 1000+ candidates including freshers and numerous digital marketing professionals to have a strong career.
Course Types:
Digital Marketing Course
Course Syllabus & Modules
  • Introduction to Digital Marketing
  • WordPress Management
  • Content Marketing
  • Google Ads
  • Lead Generation for Business
  • Google Analytics
  • Search Engine Optimization
  • Social Media Marketing and many more
 

Conclusion

This is all about the top 10 digital marketing institutes in South Delhi and we hope the article about the digital marketing course has really helped you to get the most suitable course for you. You can easily choose the best institute from your choice that will provide you with the benefits of learning all the modules of digital marketing effectively and efficiently. So, if you are living in Delhi and looking for the best digital marketing professional training courses in South Delhi, those mentioned above as top Digital Marketing Courses in Delhi are the most promising ones. You may comment below for any query and we would be glad to assist you at the earliest.
